data.title: UEFA European Championship Scores
data.meta_description: Live scores for UEFA European Championship games on ESPN. Includes box scores, video highlights, play breakdowns and updated odds.
data.text:
Cristiano Ronaldo in Portugal squad after goalless Euro 2024

Portugal coach Roberto Martínez has included Cristiano Ronaldo in his squad for the first two Nations League matches following the veteran forward's disappointing European Championship.

Associated Press

Ilkay Gündogan retires from Germany duty after 82 caps

Ilkay Gündogan announced his retirement from international football with Germany on Monday having captained his nation at their home European Championship earlier this summer.

ESPN
